insert()

insert(object $entity) : int

Inserts an entity into the mapped table using a write connection.

Parameters

object $entity

The entity to insert.

Returns

int —

The last insert ID.

Tags

None found

update()

update(object $entity, array $initial_data) : bool

Updates an entity in the mapped table using a write connection; if an array of initial data is present, updates only changed values.

Parameters

object $entity

The entity to update.
array $initial_data

Initial data for the entity.

Returns

bool —

True if the update succeeded, false if not. (This is determined by checking the number of rows affected by the query.)

Tags

None found

delete()

delete(object $entity) : bool

Deletes an entity from the mapped table using a write connection.

Parameters

object $entity

The entity to delete.

Returns

bool —

True if the delete succeeded, false if not. (This is determined by checking the number of rows affected by the query.)

Tags

None found

newSelect()

newSelect(array $cols) : \Aura\Sql\Query\Select

Returns a new Select object for the mapped table using a read connection.

Parameters

array $cols

Select these columns from the table; when empty, selects all mapped columns.

Returns

\Aura\Sql\Query\Select

Tags

None found

fetchOneBy()

fetchOneBy(string $col, mixed $val) : array

Selects one row from the mapped table for a given column and value(s).

Parameters

string $col

The column to use for matching.
mixed $val

The value(s) to match against; this can be an array of values.

Returns

array

Tags

None found

fetchAllBy()

fetchAllBy(string $col, mixed $val) : array

Selects all rows from the mapped table for a given column and value.

Parameters

string $col

The column to use for matching.
mixed $val

The value(s) to match against; this can be an array of values.

array
